item.title: Google Maps Extended Routes browser extension
item.description: The great web extension for motorbikers, cyclists and everyone who use Google Maps for planning long routes. See the homepage Read Medium story üö¥ Extend routes beyond 10 points üìè Optimize multi-stop routes for shorter travel to save time and fuel üì± Prepare a route for mobile navigation solving “disappearing waypoints” problem üåç Export your route to popular services: Apple Maps, TomTom Planner, Bing Maps and Yandex Maps üíæ Download a route as GPX or KML file

item.title: VLC Sync Play
item.description: I created it to watch movies with my girlfriend on one screen but listening to 2 different audio tracks. Each of us has a pair of earphones and each listens to its own audio track. The key feature is that they are synchronized. I can pause, play, seek, and the other player will do the same. See the Github repo It’s an experimental project, I wanted to show that it’s possible to create such a tool using Golang, even though it’s not the best language for GUI applications.

item.title: GitHub Actions integration testing lib
item.description: Check out https://github.com/cardinalby/github-action-ts-run-api Purpose üî∂ Executing your GitHub action locally (or at any other environment). üî∂ Writing integration and functional tests, run them locally and at CI. üî∂ Having a short feedback loop without pushing and checking it behaviour at real GitHub runners every time. Features ‚úÖ Supports executing JavaScript and Docker actions. ‚úÖ Tested under Windows, Linux and macOS locally and on GitHub hosted runners. ‚úÖ Works well with Docker Desktop under Windows and macOS (for Docker actions).

item.title: "Tea collage" creative project
item.description: The project is a digital interactive addition to a collage of Chinese tea wrappers that I have been drinking for the past three years. I have always loved teas and drank them in exorbitant quantities, but I went deeper into the topic of Chinese teas since 2015. Open Tea Collage One of the my favorite tea sort is shu and shen pu-erh; traditionally they are made in the form of pressed cakes.

item.title: Memrise Audio Uploader
item.description: Memrise Audio Uploader is a Chrome extension which allows you to upload sounds of words and phrases pronunciation from soundoftext.com to memrise.com course. Check out the source code https://github.com/cardinalby/memrise-audio-uploader Install from the stores Chrome Web Store Firefox Add-ons To download the offline versions please go to the Releases page. Screenshots
